Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Sercotel Oriente in Zaragoza, you'll be minutes from Pablo Gargallo Museum and Plaza de Espana. This hotel is within close proximity of Museo Ibercaja Camon Aznar and Roman Wall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bathrobes and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Sercotel Oriente. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Sercotel Oriente. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Sercotel Oriente in Zaragoza, you'll be minutes from Pablo Gargallo Museum and Plaza de Espana. This hotel is within close proximity of Museo Ibercaja Camon Aznar and Roman Wall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pablo Serrano Museum - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria Magdalena Church - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Sercotel Oriente is Zaragoza (ZAZ) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Sercotel Oriente is Zaragoza (ZAZ-Zaragoza Airport) - 10.5 km / 6.5 mi.
